tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FashionTrends (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  season TEXT NOT NULL,
  year INT NOT NULL,
  trend_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trend_forecast (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_id INT,
    forecast_date DATE,
    forecast_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES fashion_trends(trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FashionTrends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_start_date DATE,
    trend_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_category VARCHAR(50),
    trend_start_date DATE,
    trend_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_id INT,
    data_date DATE,
    data_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES fashion_trends(trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trend_forecast (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_id INT,
    forecast_date DATE,
    forecast_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES fashion_trends(trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE collection_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_id INT,
    plan_date DATE,
    plan_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES fashion_trends(trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    category_id INT,
    brand_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES clothing_categories(category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES fashion_brands(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES fashion_items(item_id)
);
